tutorial_hall.description:
Hello Adventurer!
You have been tasked with recovering the legendary Shards of Aether, ancient relics of immense power.Scattered across mystical lands, these shards must be returned to their rightful altars to restore balance to the realm.

Welcome to the Guild Hall!

guild_library.description: Shelves of dusty books tower above you. You see an amulet on a scribe's desk. An of glow seems to emanates from it.

items.name: Mystical Amulet
items.description: Your first Aether Shard item. Take this to it's Altar to complete the level.

sacred_altar.description: An ancient stone altar. A glowing aura fills the room.
